text: Revaldo Fifaldi Surya Permana (born 18 June 1982) is an Indonesian actor.https://entertainment.kompas.com/read/2023/01/13/130307066/profil-dan- biodata-revaldo-pasang-surut-karier-di-pusaran-narkoba == Career == Revaldo started his career as a fashion model. Revaldo entered the world of acting in 2003, through his role as Rangga in the soap opera Ada Apa Dengan Cinta?, which was adapted from the 2002 film of the same name. == Controversy/Case == Revaldo was involved in the beating case of Fahmi Fatur Rachman in 2004. This case resulted in him being behind bars for three days. The judge sentenced him to three months in prison, with probation for six months. Revaldo and his friends were caught red-handed partying with drugs on April 10 2006, so on August 30 of the same year, the panel of judges sentenced them to two years in prison, along with a fine of one million rupiah and a subsidiary of one month in prison, because they were proven not to have the right to possessing methamphetamine-type drugs. Revaldo was released from prison on September 7 2007, because of his good behavior while serving his sentence. On July 21 2010, Revaldo was arrested again for drug use. Revaldo is known to have 50 grams of crystal methamphetamine. After five years in prison, Revaldo was released on September 5 2015.
